trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event to provide custom value conversion from a user-specified value to a value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件以提供自訂的值從使用者指定的值轉換值的轉換儲存格所指定的型別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event, you can convert the value yourself or you can customize the default conversion.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件，您可以自行轉換值，或您可以自訂預設轉換。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can convert the value yourself using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with type converters of your choosing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以將值轉換自己使用資料格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>使用類型轉換器，您所選擇的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can let the default type converters parse the value, but modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以讓預設的類型轉換器剖析值，但修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，使用儲存格初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you convert the value yourself, replace the initial, formatted value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property with the converted value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當您自行轉換值時，取代初始，其格式的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性之資料格所指定的型別轉換的值與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further parsing is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要指出不再剖析是必要，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is parsed using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with default type converters.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式完成時，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>是`null`或不正確的型別，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A>屬性是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>使用資料格會剖析<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>方法使用預設類型轉換器。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method parses the value using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style passed in.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的預設實作會剖析值使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>傳入的儲存格樣式屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is not equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, the value is parsed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property and the type converters passed in.
trans-unit.target: 如果值不等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>、 值剖析使用的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>屬性和傳入的類型轉換器</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a cell value into a formatted value for display, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要自訂的資料格的值轉換為格式化的值來顯示，處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that was changed.
trans-unit.target: 已變更的資料格資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell that was changed.
trans-unit.target: 已變更的資料格資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: The new value.
trans-unit.target: 新的值。

trans-unit.source: The type of the new value.
trans-unit.target: 新值的類型。

trans-unit.source: The style applied to the cell that was changed.
trans-unit.target: 套用至已變更的資料格的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index of the cell data that requires parsing.
trans-unit.target: 取得需要剖析的資料格資料的資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: Use the ColumnIndex property to obtain an index into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: ColumnIndex 屬性用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>來取得索引

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell that was changed.
trans-unit.target: 已變更的資料格資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style applied to the edited cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定套用至已編輯的儲存格的樣式。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine the formatting in effect for the cell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷有效的格式儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property or changing the properties of the object that this property returns has no effect unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A> is `false` when the event handler exits.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性，或變更這個屬性會傳回物件的屬性沒有作用，除非已<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A>是`false`當事件處理常式會結束。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style are used to parse the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>的儲存格樣式屬性會用來剖析資料格的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the current style of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> ，代表目前正在編輯的儲存格樣式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle*> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是資料格的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a cell's value has been successfully parsed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已成功剖析的資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventHandler> sets the ParsingApplied property to indicate whether the new cell value was successfully parsed and no further conversion is necessary.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventHandler>設定 ParsingApplied 屬性，指出是否已成功剖析新儲存格的值，而且不需要任何進一步的轉換。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell's value has been successfully parsed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功地剖析資料格的值;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row index of the cell that requires parsing.
trans-unit.target: 取得需要剖析的資料格的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: Use the RowIndex property to obtain an index into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: RowIndex 屬性用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>來取得索引

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that was changed.
trans-unit.target: 已變更的資料格資料列索引。
